action.description: The committee on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Kila, Grandinetti, Evslin, Kitagawa, La Chica, Miyake; Ayes with reservations: none; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Muraoka; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, Pierick.
